Title: OMS.Water - Bootstrapper
Description: Water is a  prerequisite bootstrapper and installer chainer based on WiX Burn. With Water you can easily create sophisticated WPF bootstrapper applications with modern UI.
HomeWiki:
OMS.Water - Bootstrapper

OMS.Water is a prerequisite bootstrapper and installer chainer based on WiX Burn. With OMS.Water you can easily create sophisticated WPF bootstrapper applications with modern UI.
